page.title: 09SHOPPING PAGE 2
page.content: Mr Lee has two part time assistants helping him in the shop.The shop does a delivery service to Wherstead which is about three miles away.Trade has increased since Mr Lee has had the shop .The shop is quite small and people help themselves to the goods they want off the shelves and then pay at the counter.About 100 people use the shop regularly a day.People buy eggs,butter sugar,bread and day to day goods. The post office is quite busy for a small village and about 150 people use it on a regular weekly basis.Mr Lee lives next door to his shop and also runs a small bar adjacent to the shop. Most people go to Ipswich to do their big shop once a week or monthly. Mobile food vans also visit the village e.g.a fish and chip van,grocery van etc
